The Maven's Beacon.name: The Maven's Beacon
text: Allows you to call the Maven to a map from your Map Device.

Flesh Compass.name: Flesh Compass
text: Allows you to pursue The Eater of Worlds by adding its influence to a map from your Map Device.

Luminous Astrolabe.name: Luminous Astrolabe
text: Allows you to pursue The Searing Exarch by adding its influence to a map from your Map Device.
